entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning except snow over higher terrain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain except snow over higher terrain in the evening. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Snowfall amount 4 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
